Translations.Text: wayatufu ʿalayhim ghil'manun lahum ka-annahum lu'lu-on maknunun
qalu inna kunna qablu fi ahlina mush'fiqina
famanna l-lahu ʿalayna wawaqana ʿadhaba l-samumi
inna kunna min qablu nadʿuhu innahu huwa l-baru l-rahimu
fadhakkir fama anta biniʿ'mati rabbika bikahinin wala majnunin
am yaquluna shaʿirun natarabbasu bihi rayba l-manuni
qul tarabbasu fa-inni maʿakum mina l-mutarabisina
am tamuruhum ahlamuhum bihadha am hum qawmun taghuna
am yaquluna taqawwalahu bal la yu'minuna
falyatu bihadithin mith'lihi in kanu sadiqina
am khuliqu min ghayri shayin am humu l-khaliquna
am khalaqu l-samawati wal-arda bal la yuqinuna
am ʿindahum khazainu rabbika am humu l-musaytiruna
am lahum sullamun yastamiʿuna fihi falyati mus'tamiʿuhum bisul'tanin mubinin
am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muth'qaluna
am yuriduna kaydan fa-alladhina kafaru humu l-makiduna
am lahum ilahun ghayru l-lahi sub'hana l-lahi ʿamma yush'rikuna
wa-in yaraw kis'fan mina l-samai saqitan yaqulu sahabun markumun
fadharhum hatta yulaqu yawmahumu alladhi fihi yus'ʿaquna
yawma la yugh'ni ʿanhum kayduhum shayan wala hum yunsaruna
wa-inna lilladhina zalamu ʿadhaban duna dhalika walakinna aktharahum la yaʿlamuna
wa-is'bir lihuk'mi rabbika fa-innaka bi-aʿyunina wasabbih bihamdi rabbika hina taqumu
laqad raa min ayati rabbihi l-kub'ra
in hiya illa asmaon sammaytumuha antum waabaukum ma anzala l-lahu biha min sul'tanin in yattabiʿuna illa l-zana wama tahwa l-anfusu walaqad jaahum min rabbihimu l-huda
